title: Match making
body: How hard is it to make relatively fair match made games? I am low elo, level 22 and learning new roles. Riot keeps putting gold and plat players on the other team who are partied with a person at my rank and they just stomp the games. I dont understand how hard of a concept it is to not do that. Any explanation to this rito or do you not care about low elo stuff?

replies.body: Ranked MMR is totally separate from normal games, so matchmaking will need to adjust a spot best fit for you.  This will continue to happen as you play more games, and adjust.  Give it a few games and you should find a more comfortable spot!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XtG8Niar,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-02T16:05:18.187+0000)
>
> Ranked MMR is totally separate from normal games, so matchmaking will need to adjust a spot best fit for you.  This will continue to happen as you play more games, and adjust.  Give it a few games and you should find a more comfortable spot!

This is so far from the truth right now. I have well over 1200 games on normal and am being pitted against people almost 1000 mmr higher than me.
